question: I carefully read each book before returning it to the library.
I have no hesitation when someone needs help in trouble.
I always carefully monitor how I am dressed.
I have never experienced antipathy for anyone.
I always listen carefully to the interlocutor, no matter who he is.
I always readily admit my mistakes.
I donâ€™t have an internal protest when I am asked to provide a service.
I never get annoyed when they express an opinion contrary to mine.
